languages.text: "Проктор Антар выступает не как соглядатай, а как представитель Адепта, который поможет вам разобраться в нюансах законодательства и в случае необходимости направит вас на верный путь".

traits.locale_text: "Вольные Торговцы имеют особенность очень вольно трактовать Лекс Империалис. Проктор Антар поможет вам разобраться в нюансах законодательства и в случае чего направит вас на верный путь".
traits.speaker: VC_Prefect

languages.text: "Proctor Anthar's capacity is not that of a spy, but that of a representative of our organisations who will help you to navigate the many nuances of the Imperial Law and, if the need arises, direct you down the just path."
languages.original_text: "Проктор Антар выступает не как соглядатай, а как представитель Адепта, который поможет вам разобраться в нюансах законодательства и в случае необходимости направит вас на верный путь".

traits.locale_text: "Proctor Anthar's capacity is not that of a spy, but that of a representative of our organisations who will help you to navigate the many nuances of the law and, if the need arises, direct you down the just path."

"Proctor Anthar's capacity is not that of a spy, but that of a representative of our organisations who will help you to navigate the many nuances of the Imperial Law and, if the need arises, direct you down the just path."

languages.text: « Le proctor Anthar n'a pas un rôle d'espion, mais en tant que représentant de nos organisations, il vous aidera à saisir au mieux les nombreuses subtilités de la loi et, si nécessaire, à vous orienter sur le droit chemin. »
languages.original_text: "Proctor Anthar's capacity is not that of a spy, but that of a representative of our organisations who will help you to navigate the many nuances of the Imperial Law and, if the need arises, direct you down the just path."

traits.locale_text: « Le proctor Anthar n'a pas un rôle d'espion, mais en tant que représentant de nos organisations, il vous aidera à saisir au mieux les nombreuses subtilités de la loi et, si nécessaire, à vous orienter sur le droit chemin. »

languages.text: «El Procurador Anthar no estará haciendo de espía, sino de representante de nuestras organizaciones, ayudándole a navegar las numerosas complejidades de la ley del Imperium y, en caso de necesidad, dirigirle por el buen camino».
languages.original_text: "Proctor Anthar's capacity is not that of a spy, but that of a representative of our organisations who will help you to navigate the many nuances of the Imperial Law and, if the need arises, direct you down the just path."

traits.locale_text: «El Procurador Anthar no estará haciendo de espía, sino de representante de nuestras organizaciones, ayudándole a navegar las numerosas complejidades de la ley del Imperium y, en caso de necesidad, dirigirle por el buen camino».

«El Procurador Anthar no estará haciendo de espía, sino de representante de nuestras organizaciones, ayudándole a navegar las numerosas complejidades de la ley y, en caso de necesidad, dirigirle por el buen camino».

languages.text: “安萨监察官并不是什么间谍，而是帝国法务部的代表成员。他可以协助您了解帝国法律法规的细枝末节。如果您需要的话，他还可以守护您寸步不离正义之路。”
languages.original_text: "Proctor Anthar's capacity is not that of a spy, but that of a representative of our organisations who will help you to navigate the many nuances of the Imperial Law and, if the need arises, direct you down the just path."

traits.locale_text: “安萨监察官并不是什么间谍，而是帝国法务部的代表成员。他可以协助您了解帝国法律法规的细枝末节。如果您需要的话，他还可以守护您寸步不离正义之路。”
“安萨监察官并不是什么间谍，而是帝国法务部的代表成员。他可以协助您了解法律法规的细枝末节。如果您需要的话，他还可以守护您寸步不离正义之路。”

languages.text: "Proktor Anthar ist kein Spion, sondern ein Vertreter unserer Organisation, der Euch helfen wird, durch die vielen Nuancen des imperialen Gesetzes zu navigieren, und Euch falls nötig auf den rechten Weg führt."
languages.original_text: "Proctor Anthar's capacity is not that of a spy, but that of a representative of our organisations who will help you to navigate the many nuances of the Imperial Law and, if the need arises, direct you down the just path."

traits.locale_text: "Proktor Anthar ist kein Spion, sondern ein Vertreter unserer Organisation, der Euch helfen wird, durch die vielen Nuancen des imperialen Gesetzes zu navigieren, und Euch falls nötig auf den rechten Weg führt."
"Proktor Anthar ist kein Spion, sondern ein Vertreter unserer Organisation, der Euch helfen wird, durch die vielen Nuancen des Gesetzes zu navigieren, und Euch falls nötig auf den rechten Weg führt."

languages.text:
「アンサール代理人の役割はスパイではなく、私たちの組織の代表として、帝国の
法律の多くのニュアンスを案内し、必要があれば正しい道を示す上で役に立つでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Proctor Anthar's capacity is not that of a spy, but that of a representative of our organisations who will help you to navigate the many nuances of the Imperial Law and, if the need arises, direct you down the just path."

traits.locale_text: 「アンサール代理人の役割はスパイではなく、私たちの組織の代表として、法律の多くのニュアンスを案内し、必要があれば正しい道を示す上で役に立つでしょう」
「アンサール代理人の役割はスパイではなく、私たちの組織の代表として、法律の多くのニュアンスを案内し、必要があれば正しい道を示す上で役に立つでしょう」

languages.text: "Üsteğmen Anthar'ın vazifesi; casusluk yapmak değil, kuruluşlarımızın temsilcisi olarak İmparatorluk Yasası'ndaki birçok nüansta kafanızın karışmasını engellemek ve ihtiyaç hâlinde sizi adalet yoluna sevk etmektir."
languages.original_text: "Proctor Anthar's capacity is not that of a spy, but that of a representative of our organisations who will help you to navigate the many nuances of the Imperial Law and, if the need arises, direct you down the just path."

traits.locale_text: "Üsteğmen Anthar'ın vazifesi; casusluk yapmak değil, kuruluşlarımızın temsilcisi olarak İmparatorluk Yasası'ndaki birçok nüansta kafanızın karışmasını engellemek ve ihtiyaç hâlinde sizi adalet yoluna sevk etmektir."

"Üsteğmen Anthar'ın vazifesi; casusluk yapmak değil, kuruluşlarımızın temsilcisi olarak yasalardaki birçok nüansta kafanızın karışmasını engellemek ve ihtiyaç hâlinde sizi adalet yoluna sevk etmektir."
